content: Is anyone aware of a computable mapping that exists from QICore to QDM? Something similar to the mapping table in the QICore implementation guide (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/2018Jan/qdm-to-qicore.html), but that we could leverage to transform FHIR JSON into QDM without manually building the mappings?

@Kenny Blanchette , I'm not aware of anything directly computable yet, but it's something we want to focus on in the next Clinical Reasoning track. We'd welcome any input on that, we're planning on focusing now on some well-understood measures we've run in the past (Breast Cancer, Cervical Cancer, and Colorectal Cancer Screening), to scope the problem space.
great, thanks @Bryn Rhodes (FYI @Kevin Weaver)
